Entry.JapaneseText: ……シャオルーン……私…… もう元の身体に戻れないのかな？
Entry.EnglishText: ...Shaorune... Will I... ever return to my original body?

Entry.JapaneseText: 元の身体に戻りたいの？ やっぱり、イヤなのかい？
Entry.EnglishText: You want to go back to your original body? I guess things are no good as they are?

Entry.JapaneseText: イヤって事とはちょっと違うと思う…… だってアガーテ様は本当にキレイだし……
Entry.EnglishText: I wouldn't really say that it's not good... Agarte is truly beautiful, after all...

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、お父さんもお母さんも驚くだろうし 村のみんなにも……心配かけたくないから……
Entry.EnglishText: But my mother and father would likely be surprised and I don't want to trouble... the other villagers...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……そっか。キミはそういう子だったね。 大丈夫。物事はなるようになるから。
Entry.EnglishText: ...I see. That's the kind of person you are. No need to worry. Things'll turn out fine in the end.
